instance.name: contents
instance.description: gets or sets the contents attribute of tabElement

instance.name: name
instance.description: gets or sets the group attribute of tabElement

instance.name: tabs
instance.returns: an array of all the tab-selects in the document that are part of same group as tabElement

instance.name: content
instance.returns: an array of all the tab-contents in the document that are part of the same group as tabElement

instance.name: selected
instance.description: gets or sets the selected boolean attribute from tabElement
